name: Ego Death
description:
Ego Death is about a troubled man named Jack, who finds himself atop the highest cliff of a mountain, having gone there to throw himself off the edge. Yet, at the last moment, a part of himself decides he wants to live. However the darker parts of himself have other plans for him.

Features:

Hack and Slash through enemies with your katana.

Switch between the DARK world and the LIGHT to reveal platforms and secrets.

Original art and soundtrack creating an atmosphere of quiet sadness.

Unlock exciting new abilities on your journey.

Contemplate if life is worth living.
